title: R: Create a histogram from frequency list
html:
In R, hist is a great function to create histograms from data. It counts data, compute frequency, and show a histogram. Then how can I get histograms from frequency data that I already have? I wasnâ€™t able to find nicer solution, so wrote this.

> hist.from.freq(seq(0, 9), c(154, 105, 72, 16, 111, 103, 81, 84, 38, 158), normalize = T)
